originalText.text: I found Janene on Instagram and she had a promotion for Russian manicure for $35 which was a steal. I love her attention to detail and taking time and making sure my nails look perfect. She was very professional, informative and precise with her work . Her prices for Russian manicure is a steal. 10 out of 10 will definitely go back there.

originalText.text: Janene's calm energy and warm spirt is unmatched. I was terrified at the idea of getting a Brazilian but also couldn't stand the discomfort that came from shaving that area. I searched high and low for a sugaring expert close to my home in Harlem and stumbled across her site. I absolutely loved my experience. Her space is clean, she's very patient and thorough and makes the entire appointment soothing and relaxing. I can't wait to go back next month!

originalText.text: Janene changed my life with sugaring! I had tried hard wax once before meeting Janene and said I would never wax again because of how traumatic my experience was. However, giving Janene and her sugaring skills a chance completely changed the way I feel about waxing. I could never go back to shaving. She is so friendly and professional. I look forward to my monthly appointments. I‚Äôve recommended her to my family and friends because she really is the best in the game.

originalText.text: 10/10 would reccomended. I booked through her website and accidentally booked the wrong service. I reached out on instagram and she let me know she could make the change. Finding her locations wasn‚Äôt too bad. I was a little confused when I walked in and saw it was a hair salon but the woman at the front sent me right back. The whole process was quick and with as little pain as possible. We had a great conversation and she even gave me some great places to check out around the city. The vibe was very chill and she made me feel comfortable and safe throughout it all. If it‚Äôs your first or 100th time, get to her stat. Also loved that it was a black owned business.

originalText.text: Janene is always clean, thorough & consistent. She is knowledgeable, takes her time & ensures that you are comfortable. The environment she creates makes it a pleasant experience, and she has an amazing energy - which is why I keep going back. I‚Äôve recommended all my friends to her as well, and they agree!
